introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Zen Nautica, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information about how you use our website:
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data through cookies and similar technologies

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description: Required for basic website functionality and security. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website. You can opt-out of these cookies.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process your bookings, communicate with you about our services, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

dataProtection.title: How We Protect Your Data
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to request deletion of your data
Right to restrict processing of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
